events.message: The insured has reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection, submitting initial details about the collision and damages.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under 'Auto Accident' due to keywords found related to vehicle collision and damages.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims was assigned to handle the case promptly and ensure proper follow-up.
The insured received confirmation that their claim has been received and acknowledged by the insurance company.
The claims department requested copies of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates for assessment.
The insured submitted the requested documentation including the accident report, vehicle pictures, and repair shop estimates.
The claim investigation team began examining the circumstances of the accident and validating the submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming the insured's version of events and assessing the damage aligns with reported collision conditions.
The insurer proposed a settlement amount covering the estimated repairs and any applicable deductibles as per policy terms.
The insured responded favorably to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the insurer's communication and offer.
Claim approval was finalized and formalized after the insured reviewed and accepted the settlement amount offered.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been processed and disbursed to the insured’s designated bank account.
The claim was successfully closed after payment issuance and confirmation that the insured had no further questions.
All documents and records related to this auto accident claim have been archived in the company’s database for future reference.
